dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for calling StreamWave Support. This is Sarah. How can I help you today?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: My subscription price went up without any notice.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m sorry for the frustration. Let me check your account details. May I have your account ID?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. I see the increase is due to the end of a promotional discount.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: That’s really upsetting. I can’t afford this.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand how disappointing that can be. While I can’t reinstate the promotion, I can offer a smaller loyalty discount going forward.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’m still not happy about it.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand. I’ve applied the discount and noted your feedback on the account.
